item.title: pleb.fi austin
item.description:
pleb.fi

/austin

in austin august 21st-22nd
(weekend before bitblockboom dallas)

bring your pajamas

(there’s a hackathon)

Tweet

our lovely event sponsors

trammell venture partners

lnpay

judica

lincoln network

unchained capital

sphinx.chat

anon supporter <3

voltage cloud

fulgur ventures

larry chiang

staking.dog

fold

casa

galaxy digital

amanda fabiano


key dates

see below for exact agenda.

  • sat 21st august day: workshops + talks
  • sat 21st august evening: hackathon kickoff
  • sunday 22nd august day: hackathon
  • sunday 22nd august evening: hackathon demos

other fun around the event

pleb.fi is the 21st/22nd, but there’s some other nearby bitcoin stuff

item.title: pleb.fi July 2025
item.description:
pleb.fi

/july2025

july 26-27 at TBD

come hack on things that will blow your minds

come for 2 days of hacking, mentorship, workshops, and discussions. the theme is TBD.

APPLICATIONS

fill out this form and we’ll send you a follow up email to buy tickets through eventbrite.

ticket prices will be:

  1. $20 for early bird (before July 18)
  2. $40 regular (July 18+)

with gratitude to…

interested in becoming a sponsor? we’d love to have you! reach out to us here!

item.title: pleb.fi miami
item.description:
pleb.fi

/miami

???Looking for 2022???

never stop improvin bitcoin,
but specifically on june 6th 2021 in miami

think outside the box

june 6th, 2021, miami at a secret location, 12-5pm.

not the best. not the brightest. the plebs.

like 50 of them.

come for a day of hacking, mentorship, workshops, and discussions on how to contribute to bitcoin functionality accelerationism and build decentralized finance applications on bitcoin. we'll also get into how to get your project funded either traditionally or through new age pleb means.

item.title: pleb.fi miami 2022
item.description:
pleb.fi

ðŸŽ¶ the plebs are back in townðŸŽ¶

badder

BIGGER

but most importantly…

PLEBBER

april 4-5th 2022 in miami (hialeah area)

its sapioszn

get in loser we’re buidling

if you dont come you will have to turn in your pleb card

come for 2 days of hacking, mentorship, workshops, and discussions on how to contribute to bitcoin functionality accelerationism and build kickass applications on bitcoin using sapio, taproot, ctv, and more. we’ll also get into how to get your project funded either traditionally or through new age pleb means.
